summary: Danny de Vito pudo ser la voz de Detective Pikachu
title: Danny de Vito pudo ser la voz de Detective Pikachu
body:
Danny de Vito pudo ser la voz de Detective Pikachu

Detective Pikachu llegará a los cines el 10 de mayo, con Ryan Reynolds prestando su voz al carismático Pokémon ahora metido a investigador. Pero antes de que el actor de Deadpool se hiciera con el papel, Danny de Vito estuvo en la cabeza de los productores.

El porqué de pensar en el mítico Pingüino de Batman Returns se debe a las peticiones de los fans. Desde el lanzamiento del juego de…

summary: Pokemon Detective Pikachu Team Tested Casting Danny DeVito
title: Pokemon Detective Pikachu Team Tested Casting Danny DeVito
body:
Pokemon Detective Pikachu Team Tested Casting Danny DeVito

One of the early requests from fans for the upcoming Pokemon Detective Pikachu movie was the hope that Danny DeVito would be the voice of Detective Pikachu himself. As we now know, it was Ryan Reynolds who was eventually chosen by the team. It has been uncovered by Game Informer that Danny DeVito was actually trialed for the role by the production company. As the VFX producer explained to the…

View On WordPress

summary: Detective Pikachu potrebbe lanciare un Pokemon Cinematic Universe?
title: Detective Pikachu potrebbe lanciare un Pokemon Cinematic Universe?
body:
Detective Pikachu potrebbe lanciare un Pokemon Cinematic Universe?

Il prossimo film dei Pokemon, Detective Pikachu, potrebbe essere l’inizio di un Pokemon Cinematic Universe in live-vivo, secondo il produttore di Legendary Entertainment – Ali Mendes. Durante un set visit del film Detective Pikachu ambientato fuori Londra lo scorso anno, IGNe un piccolo gruppo di addetti stampa hanno parlato con Mendes della possibilità di espandere il mondo Pokemon dal vivo…

blog.name: tigerlover16-uk
blog.title: Tiger Lover 16-UK
blog.description: Jack Humphreys, Age 24, From Wales. I'm a Christian, animal lover, an animation fan and a gigantic nerd. Fan of Spider-man, Dragon Ball, DC and Marvel Comics, MLP, Harry Potter and a variety of other shows, movies, comics and books. I'm just here to have fun, do some good and talk about the things i like (And sometimes the stuff I don't).

summary: The one thing I’m not looking forward to in regards to Detective Pikachu is how Doug Walker is inevitably going to do a...
body:
The one thing I’m not looking forward to in regards to Detective Pikachu is how Doug Walker is inevitably going to do a nostalgia critic review of it where it’ll be 90% him whining about how much he hates Pokémon and how it’s stupid, and fans are stupid for liking it.

I mean, I don’t watch the Nostalgia Critic anymore so whatever, but it annoys me to think about.

reblog.comment:

I mean, I don’t watch the Nostalgia Critic anymore so whatever, but it annoys me to think about.

I mean, I don’t watch the Nostalgia Critic anymore so whatever, but it annoys me to think about.

summary: Ali Mendes spiega perché ci è voluto tanto per un film dei Pokemon in live-action
title: Ali Mendes spiega perché ci è voluto tanto per un film dei Pokemon in live-action
body:
Ali Mendes spiega perché ci è voluto tanto per un film dei Pokemon in live-action

Quando per la prima volta uscirono le notizie su questo adattamento c’è stato non poco scetticismo, ma dopo che il primo trailer di Detective Pikachu è uscito, il buzz delle agorà virtuali è salito alle stelle, lasciando intendere come il film sia destinato a diventare uno dei film più chiacchierati del 2019.

Finalmente, The Pokemon Company rivelerà come personaggi come Jigglypuff e Snorlax…

View On WordPress

summary: It’s interesting to me that this is like. word for word in some ways what people wished Emilia could have been like in the game....
caption:
It’s interesting to me that this is like. word for word in some ways what people wished Emilia could have been like in the game.

I guess if they’re gonna replace her it’s good it’s with someone better, at least?

summary: El productor de Detective Pikachu quiere crear un universo de películas Pokémon
title: El productor de Detective Pikachu quiere crear un universo de películas Pokémon
body:
El productor de Detective Pikachu quiere crear un universo de películas Pokémon

El equipo de desarrollo de Detective Pikachu podría estar interesado en un supuesto Pokémon Cinematic Universe.

El productor Ali Mendes se ha pronunciado la idea de crear un universo cinemático de Pokémon. Esto iría más allá de la película de acción real de Detective Pikachu, ya que piensa que Pokémon tiene un universo muy rico.

Sus palabras fueron:

“Estamos intentando que la primera película…
